Train a Model on Data Split

{% raw %} 
frz,epochs,pre,re,bs,fold,smooth,arch,dump,log,lr = 1,1,64,31,512,0,True,"resnet18",False,False,1e-3
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dls = get_dls_all_in_1(presize=pre, resize=re, bs=bs, val_fold=fold)
if smooth: loss_func = LabelSmoothingCrossEntropyFlat()
else:      loss_func = CrossEntropyLossFlat()
m = globals()[arch]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
cbs = [WandbCallback(), SaveModelCallback()] if log else []
learn = Learner(dls, m, loss_func=loss_func,
                metrics=[accuracy, RocAuc()], cbs=cbs)
if dump: print(learn.model); exit()
# Add more callbacks
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

train[source]

train(epochs:int, lr:float, frz:int=1, pre:int=800, re:int=256, bs:int=256, fold:int=0, smooth:bool=True, arch:str='resnet18', dump:bool=False, log:bool=False)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn = train(0, 0.001, bs=256, log=False)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn.final_record
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

train_cv[source]

train_cv(epochs:"Number of unfrozen epochs", lr:"Initial learning rate", frz:"Number of frozen epochs"=1, pre:"Presize"=800, re:"Resize"=256, bs:"Batch size"=256, smooth:"Label smoothing?"=False, arch:"Architecture"='resnet18', dump:"Print model"=False, log:"Log w/ W&B"=False)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
scores = np.ones((5, 4))
scores.mean(0)
